title: NTP Ep. 2 - What makes you want to quit? with Christine Caine
description:
Do you want to quit? My friend Christine knows what it feels like to want to give up. Join us as we talk about following Jesus and the moments when we're weary and what to do when we want to quit.

Find Christine's book: https://www.amazon.com/How-Did-Get-Here-Everything/dp/1400226562

We love the Dwell audio-Bible app, find it here: dwellapp.io/madeforthis
